Cancellation of Classes & Examinations for Tomorrow (12 November 2019)

===================================

To: All Staff and Students



In view of situations that may pose difficulties for staff and students in commuting to the campuses, all classes and examinations scheduled in all campuses will be cancelled for tomorrow (12 November 2019). The Heads of Departments will exercise flexibility in dealing with lateness, leave of absence and early release of individual staff members due to traffic situation. The U Shuttle Service to and from University MTR will remain unchanged.



In any case, please be aware of the changes in transport situation and safety. Thank you for your attention.



Professor John Lee Chi-kin

Vice President (Academic) and Provost
